pages.title: this is other title BB
pages.description: What if you want to create such a platform? Especially one that works on a touchscreen and that is accessible? You want to create something like Codecademy, Educative, or Codewars? I do so that’s why I created Live JavaScript. But now it’s time for an upgrade, so I started to see what code editor I should use there. I tried several code editors, but one stood out: CodeMirror. Marijn Haverbeke is doing a complete rewrite of the existing code base, and the new CodeMirror is a great piece of software. I hope this small guide will encourage you to give it a try. By all means, this is not an exhaustive tutorial of CodeMirror 6. There are just too many things it can do. Maybe that is a problem, is a bit hard to find what you need. This is just a quick get-started guide
